backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a habit tracker backend with access-controlled CRUD operations for user profiles and habits, including check-in tracking, streak calculation, and default habit seeding.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features — swipe-left delete gesture on HabitCard and the useDeleteHabit mutation hook — to their respective source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted catalogue of short summaries for every frontend source file, describing the purpose and key behaviors of each component, page, hook, and config file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the full design token set (colors, radius, chart, sidebar) in both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Vite/React app, mounting the React root div and loading the main TSX entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with a root Layout route and two child routes: HabitsPage at '/' and SummaryPage at '/summary'.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Wraps children with Internet Identity authentication checks, showing a loading spinner, a login prompt with LoginButton, or the protected content depending on auth state.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with Habits, Summary, and a disabled Settings tab, highlighting the active route with primary color and a dot indicator.
frontend/src/components/CheckInButton.ts: Renders a 44px circular button that shows a green check when already checked in, a muted circle for past dates, or an interactive ring button for today that triggers the useCheckIn mutation.
frontend/src/components/DateStrip.tsx: Horizontally scrollable week strip (Mon–Sun) that highlights today with a border and the selected date with a filled primary background, emitting the chosen date via a callback.
frontend/src/components/FAB.tsx: Fixed circular floating action button positioned above the bottom nav that triggers an onClick callback to open the add-habit modal.
frontend/src/components/HabitCard.tsx: Renders a single habit card with check-in status, pastel styling, and a left-swipe-to-delete gesture that triggers the delete mutation with animation.
frontend/src/components/HabitForm.tsx: Form component for creating a new habit with name and optional description fields, submitting via the useAddHabit mutation.
frontend/src/components/HabitFormModal.t: Bottom-sheet modal wrapper around HabitForm for adding a new habit, closing on success or dismiss.
frontend/src/components/HabitList.tsx: Fetches and renders the list of HabitCard components for a selected date, seeding default habits if none exist and showing a loading spinner otherwise.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell with a sticky header (logo + login button), main content outlet with bottom padding, an optional footer, and a bottom navigation bar.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button that handles Internet Identity login and logout, clearing the React Query cache on logout and retrying login if already authenticated.
frontend/src/components/StreakDisplay.ts: Displays the current and longest check-in streaks for a habit using the useStreakCalculation hook.
frontend/src/components/WeeklySummary.ts: Shows a weekly stats dashboard with total check-ins, completion rate, active habit count, and a per-habit progress breakdown using useWeeklySummary.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor via React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor (identity) changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDateCheckIn.ts: Pure hook that checks whether any check-in timestamp in a list falls within the calendar day of a given target date.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity auth context (login, logout, identity, status) via AuthClient, with a React context provider and hook for consuming it.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, adding, checking in, and deleting habits via the ICP actor, plus a hook that auto-seeds a default 'Stretch & Move' habit when the list is empty.
Pure hook that computes the current and longest consecutive daily check-in streaks from an array of nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/src/hooks/useTodayCheckIn.ts: Hook that returns a boolean indicating whether the last check-in timestamp falls within today's date range.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeeklySummary.ts: Hook that aggregates the past 7 days of check-ins across all habits, returning total check-ins, completion rate, and a per-habit breakdown.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, pastel card colors, and utility classes for shadows and safe-area padding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the app with TanStack QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/HabitsPage.tsx: Main habits page that renders a date strip for day selection, a habit list filtered to the selected date, and a FAB that opens the add-habit modal, all wrapped in AuthGuard.
frontend/src/pages/SummaryPage.tsx: Summary page that displays the WeeklySummary component inside an AuthGuard with a heading and description.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters from both regular and hash-based routes, persisting them to sessionStorage, and removing sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with OKLCH color tokens, custom font sizes, Inter font family, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking existing features (swipe-to-delete HabitCard, useDeleteHabit hook) and pending feature requests (backend deleteHabit function) for the Habit Tracker app.
